title: I presume you'll be refunding the difference between Full Price and 'Early Sale' price, Riot?
body:
http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/were-changing-discounts

Considering players get Skins on-release knowing full well that they would otherwise have to wait ~1 year for them to be put on sale.

Otherwise I would have held off and saved myself 2040 RP. Not exactly a small sum of RP.

replies.body:
Mate, I work retail and I regularly get people coming in when we have a sale weeks after their purchase saying "hurr durr you ripd me off". To them I reply "if you are not happy to pay full price, do not pay full price"
When I'm not at work however, but instead I'm an online environment, reading about some entitled brat, I'm more likely to say fk off mate. When you can refund the time of your life that you spent using those skins before the sale, then I'll support a refund of your RP

why would they? that's retarded. you know about the sale, so you either pay full price and get it on release, or wait the short amount of time until it goes on sale and buy it then. you don't get the best of both worlds.

You wait a full year for them to go half price. This small sale doesn't really matter much. I bought GotS Skarner for 975RP, knowing it would be half price in a years time and didn't care. Now it going on sale for 750RP, so... get 225RP refunded? Wow that's something worth fighting for.
